title: Maanelander
description: Maanelander was a game I made in 48 hours for my exam in the subject Information Technology 2 in highschool. The task was to make a replica of the famous game Lunar Lander.

title: Meteor Shower
description: Meteor Shower is a small experimental project. I was inspired by Asteroids, the arcade space shooter from the 80-ies. Every meteor is procedurally generated and the destruction is relative to the mouse cursor.

title: Kommando Kompe
description: Kommando Kompe was the first game I ever made. My friend and I created this game during High School as an assignment. It is rather simple, due to the fact that the entire game engine was built as a part of this project. Hence this game contains no external libraries at all.
